title: Headlight Panels - Installation

body.body: Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
Do not support the motorcycle on any ancillary component, the exhaust system or any other non structural parts of the motorcycle frame.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
An unstable motorcycle may fall resulting in motorcycle damage, serious injury or death.
Position the headlight finisher carrier to the headlight.
Fit and tighten the fixings to
Position the smart key antenna housing to the carrier and secure to the moulding with the scrivets.
Fit the heated grip electrical connector to its retaining feature and route the harness as noted during removal.
The headlight finishers are held in position with bayonet panel clips.
If the bayonet panel clips remain in the carrier, remove and refit the clips to the headlight finisher prior to installation.
Fit the bayonet panel clips to the tangs on the headlight finishers.
Align the bayonet panel clips to the headlight finisher carrier.
Gently push the headlight finishers down until the panel clips are fully inserted.
